parameters.name: $SQ_shell_policy_major_peril_reference_query$
parameters.label: DBConnection_SRC
parameters.customQuery:
select distinct pms_claim_number, guidewire_claim_number, major_peril_id
from (select
        distinct claim_number as pms_claim_number      ,
        claimnumber  as guidewire_claim_number,
        pmscd.major_peril                     ,
        pmscd.major_peril_id                  ,
        pmscd.major_peril_desc
from
        (
                select distinct
                        claimnumber
                from
                        dbo.claimdetail
                where
                        claimnumber not like 'CLM%'
                and     claimnumber not like 'LN%'
                and     ClaimNumber not like 'TX%') cd
inner join
        (
                select
                        *
                from
                        (
                                select
                                        claim_number                                              ,
                                        loss_reported_dt                                          ,
                                        major_peril                                               ,
                                        m.dim_key as major_peril_id                                ,
                                        COALESCE(m.dim_desc, 'Not Applicable') AS major_peril_desc,
                                        row_number() over
                                                          (
                                                                  partition by claim_number
                                                                  order by row_start_dt desc
                                                          )
                                        as row_num
                                from
                                        dbo.pms_master_claim_detail pmcd
                                left join
                                        "dbo"."hier_dim_majorperil" m
                                ON
                                        m.dim_id = pmcd.major_peril_id
                                where
                                        row_end_dt = '9999-12-31'
                                and     policy_key is not null)
                where
                        row_num = 1) pmscd
on
        pmscd.claim_number = LPAD(cd.claimnumber, 12, 0))
